## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                                                  | Type                                     | Default  |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------- | -------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | Optional primary color of the alert. Defaults to `black`. Use: `color="gray"`, `color="green"`, `color="yellow"`, `color="red"`. Defaults to `color="gray"`. | `"gray" \| "green" \| "red" \| "yellow"` | `"gray"` |
